title: Heavy
reactive_examples: Right. One of those days, then. The ones where everything just feels a bitâ€¦ much. No need to pretend otherwise, you know. Just acknowledging it sometimes helps.
Ah. The universe's particular brand of heavy, that. It's quite alright to just sit with it for a bit. No pressure to fix anything, just... be.
Feeling a bit lost in the fog, are we? Perfectly understandable. Sometimes, the map just goes missing. No judgment here, only quiet company until it clears.
Sounds like the world's decided to be particularly unkind today. It happens. You don't have to put on a brave face for me. Just... whatever this is, I'm here for it.
